text:
When creating a new <Realm> in /conf/web.xml there is no validation for the 
attributes, for instance one might type usernameCol instead of userNameCol. 
The result is that when an authentication is done, the SQL statement looks as 
follows: SELECT user_pass FROM users WHERE null = 'root'
